verbose_text: Recent studies revealed that activation of constitutive androstane receptor (CAR) which is highly expressed in the liver, prevents diet induced obesity, reduces hepatic steatosis, improves insulin sensitivity [XREF_BIBR], and ameliorates diabetes and fatty liver disease in mice [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: constitutive androstane receptor (CAR) which is highly expressed in the liver, prevents diet-induced obesity, reduces hepatic steatosis, improves insulin
